languages.text: {n}Мужчина умолкает. Из-под капюшона раздается довольный, совсем не испуганный смешок.{/n} "Я вечен, пока Отец-Пращур мыслит обо мне".
{n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина умолкает. Из-под капюшона раздается довольный, совсем не испуганный смешок.{/n} "Я вечен, пока Отец-Пращур мыслит обо мне".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "For as long as our Father-Forebear thinks about me, I am eternal."
{n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "For as long as our Father-Forebear thinks about me, I am eternal."
{n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."
{n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."
{n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."

languages.text: {n}El hombre guarda silencio. Desde su capucha llega una risa satisfecha, carente de miedo.{/n} «Mientras nuestro Padre-Progenitor piense en mí, soy eterno».
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre guarda silencio. Desde su capucha llega una risa satisfecha, carente de miedo.{/n} «Mientras nuestro Padre-Progenitor piense en mí, soy eterno».

languages.text: {n}那个人陷入了沉默，随后兜帽下面发出了满足的笑声，没有一丝恐惧。{/n}“只要我们的元祖圣父还记得我，我就永生不灭。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."

traits.locale_text: {n}那个人陷入了沉默，随后兜帽下面发出了满足的笑声，没有一丝恐惧。{/n}“只要我们的元祖圣父还记得我，我就永生不灭。”

languages.text: {n}男は喋るのをやめた。フードの下から見える満足気な笑みに、恐怖心は感じられない。{/n}「始祖なる父が思ってくれる限り、私は永遠だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は喋るのをやめた。フードの下から見える満足気な笑みに、恐怖心は感じられない。{/n}「始祖なる父が思ってくれる限り、私は永遠だ」

languages.text: {n}Der Mann verstummt. Unter der Kapuze erklingt ein zufriedenes Kichern ohne jeden Anflug von Furcht.{/n} "Solange unser Vater-Progenitor an mich denkt, bin ich ewig."
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann verstummt. Unter der Kapuze erklingt ein zufriedenes Kichern ohne jeden Anflug von Furcht.{/n} "Solange unser Vater-Progenitor an mich denkt, bin ich ewig."

languages.text: {n}L'homme se tait un instant, puis pousse un petit rire satisfait, sans la moindre trace de peur.{/n} « Tant que notre Père-Géniteur me garde dans ses pensées, je suis éternel. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme se tait un instant, puis pousse un petit rire satisfait, sans la moindre trace de peur.{/n} « Tant que notre Père-Géniteur me garde dans ses pensées, je suis éternel. »

languages.text: {n}Adam sessizleşiyor. Kukuletasının altından korkusuz, tatmin olmuş bir kıkırtı yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ata'mız beni düşünmeye devam ettiği sürece varlığım payidardır."
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls silent. A satisfied chuckle, without a hint of fear, comes from under his hood.{/n} "As long as our Father-Progenitor thinks of me, I am eternal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam sessizleşiyor. Kukuletasının altından korkusuz, tatmin olmuş bir kıkırtı yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ata'mız beni düşünmeye devam ettiği sürece varlığım payidardır."
